Method Detail

resetOverallAverages

public void resetOverallAverages()
This method resets the overall average statistics (for the table data on the Multiple Player Stats tab).

addStatsToAveragesPanel

public void addStatsToAveragesPanel(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
This method is used with the drawTable() methods to display averages from data displayed in the table.

Parameters:
players - The players for which averages data is to be displayed.

drawTable

public void drawTable()

                      int end)
This is an overloaded method to display players between a starting and ending index in the table.

start - The starting index.
end - The ending index.

drawTable

public void drawTable(int firstNPlayers)
This is an overloaded method to display the first N players in the table

Parameters:
firstNPlayers - The number of players to be listed.

Parameters:
lastXPlayers - The amount of players to display.
